name: com.antonzhernosek.unityping
description: Dotnet Ping produces various errors in resolving addresses and working in builds. UnityEngine.Ping works well in builds, but is very primitive and needs wrappers to work properly. This is a wrapper that helps UnityEngine's Ping resolve addresses, timeout, support async/await and return a meaningful object from pinging

samples.description: A small test scene with a script to showcase how this extension can be used to check for internet connectivity
